Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! Features: Stainless steel case and alloy chain. Elegant design with mechanical movement. Clear case back so that the movement of the pocket watch can been seen Removable stainless steel chain with a clip at the end. Specifications: Case diameter: approx. 4.9 cm/ 1.9 inches Case thickness (cover included): approx. 1.3 cm/ 0.5 inches Chain length (hook included): approx. 37.5 cm/ 14.8 inches Watch weight: approx 66 g Setting time: Pull the crown away from the base of pocket watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time. Winding the watch: Push the crown back into place along the base of the watch and wind up the watch clockwise rotation with 20 times; The power will be full.(Over winding will ultimately break the spring) Do this one time each day (before sleeping). Otherwise, it will stop working. Please do not over winding up the watch if you feel the crown is tight. Package includes: 1 x Pocket watch 1 x Chain 1 x Cleaning cloth 1 x Mudder box - Clear appearance: the pocket watch has a clear front and back appearance, which allows you to view the gears clearly and check its operation - Acrylic plastic material: the front and back of the pocket watch is made of acrylic plastic instead of glass; It is not easy to be broken and can be applied in safety - Way to set time: pull the crown away from base of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time without applying battery - Easy rotating: twisting the top button on the spin, tightening a walk for 24 hours (not too tight convenient to apply next time, avoid damaging the movement) - Good gift: the mechanical pocket watch coming with gift box is a good gift for your lover, seniority, relations, friends, colleagues or yourself and so on Mudder Big Size Classical Skeleton Hand Winding Pocket Watch
